parliamentary.service.title: Parliamentary Service
parliamentary.service.para: Elected to the House of Representatives for Grey, South Australia, 2007, 2010 and 2013.

committee.service.title: Committee Service
committee.service.para: House of Representatives Standing: Industry, Science and Innovation from 11.3.08 to 19.7.10; Employment and Workplace Relations from 10.11.08 to 19.7.10; Education and Employment from 25.10.10 to 5.8.13; Agriculture and Industry from 4.12.13 (Chair from 9.12.14); Indigenous Affairs from 4.12.13.

party.positions.title: Party Positions
party.positions.para: Delegate, Liberal Party State Council (SA) from 1998.
President, Liberal Party Grey Federal Electoral Council 2000-04.
President, Liberal Party Giles State Electoral Council from 2005.

quals.work.pre.parliament.title: Qualifications and Occupation before entering Federal Parliament
quals.work.pre.parliament.para: Chair, Eyre Peninsula Agricultural Research Foundation.

electorate.title: Electorate
electorate.para: Location: a large electorate covering most of rural South Australia apart from south-east corner; it includes the centres of Burra, Ceduna, Coober Pedy, Eudunda, Kadina, Maitland, Orroroo, Peterborough, Port Augusta, Port Lincoln, Port Pirie, Roxby Downs and Whyalla.
Industries: lead smelting, steel industry, tourism, fishing, oil, gas, opals, jade, iron ore, uranium, wheat, cattle, wool, forestry, salt and slate.
State electorates: Grey includes the South Australian House of Assembly electorates of Flinders and Giles, and parts of Frome, Goyder and Stuart.
